name: xPack Dev Tools
description: Installs xPack development tools including compilers, build tools, and debugging utilities.

installPath.description: Base installation path for xPack tools

armNoneEabiGcc.description: ARM Cortex-M & Cortex-R GCC toolchain version. Empty string skips installation.

aarch64NoneElfGcc.description: ARM AArch64 bare-metal GCC toolchain version. Empty string skips installation.

riscvNoneElfGcc.description: RISC-V bare-metal GCC toolchain version. Empty string skips installation.

gcc.description: Native GCC compiler version. Empty string skips installation.

clang.description: LLVM clang/clang++ compiler version. Empty string skips installation.

cmake.description: CMake build system version. Empty string skips installation.

mesonBuild.description: Meson build system version. Empty string skips installation.

ninjaBuild.description: Ninja build tool version. Empty string skips installation.

pkgConfig.description: pkg-config tool version. Empty string skips installation.

openocd.description: OpenOCD debugging tool version. Empty string skips installation.

qemuArm.description: QEMU ARM emulator version. Empty string skips installation.

qemuRiscv.description: QEMU RISC-V emulator version. Empty string skips installation.
